hiveArticle.title: Beautiful India #8 - Mount Abu, Rajasthan
hiveArticle.body:
I will be adding a lot of Images of Beautiful Indian Places. Follow me to get more beautiful pictures of India.

**View From Highest Point in Mount Abu**

![IMG_20170304_153321830.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmamHdsS7biYwYRNMYWPukb375qTsZ6Fwq1GpiouAdobH7/IMG_20170304_153321830.jpg)

**Yet Another Outstanding View**

![IMG_20170304_153324987.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcSZUf2TvBQKz7pnLDLQ1uzg2eTfgYc3LLAB9kgnYsRSn/IMG_20170304_153324987.jpg)

**Temple at the Peak**

![IMG_20170304_140539255.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbCR348euqt5N89DmxJAmiQH99QdYqSxFTzQGqvyoB2Bv/IMG_20170304_140539255.jpg)

**Nothing Much to say :P**

![IMG_20170304_143529532.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaHuzZ7BoHp1PQZfp8fkLdwRREBGx8zzbsFEEzjXu8nxt/IMG_20170304_143529532.jpg)
